Medium: silk.

creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Design of serpentine stem with leaves and flowers with narrow leaf border on one side and other side cut.  Colors: light and dark pink, blue, green, brown, and white.
